about.fullContent: About AMP Marketing We help find more leads for businesses and help them close more sales through technologies that really work. Results-First We measure success by outcomes, not activity. Every dollar you invest should bring back more in return. No-Nonsense Clear communication, upfront prices, realistic timelines. No corporate jargon, no hidden fees. Fast & Flexible We move fast and scale with your business. No bureaucracy, no endless approval chains. Our Story AMP Marketing was built by the same team behind Prime Marketing Experts . With Michael Krieger at the helm, our core mission hasn't changed: help businesses grow through smart, results-driven marketing. Michael founded Prime Marketing Experts back in 2017. He grew up in Boston, graduated from UMass Lowell, and has spent the better part of his career helping businesses scale. Along the way, he saw something clearly: AI had reached a point where it could make marketing faster and far more affordable for everyday businesses. AMP Marketing is the result of that realization. We took everything we learned at Prime and combined it with AI tools that deliver qualified leads in days, not months. Today we serve over 500 businesses nationwide. Whether you're a plumber or a law firm, you get the same attention to detail and focus on results that Michael has brought to every project since day one. The AMP Marketing Difference Fair Pricing You know exactly what you're paying for. No surprise fees, and you can cancel whenever you want. Measurable Results We track every lead so you always know whether your investment is paying off. Fast Setup Most projects launch within a week. No waiting months to see results. Real Support Questions? Send us an email. Real people manage your account and respond quickly. Let us Get to Work → What Our Clients Say We scaled from 10 leads a month to over 100 in just 8 weeks. The chatbot generates leads around the clock while we focus on running the business. Mike R. HVAC Company Owner We've worked with several agencies before, but none delivered this fast. More patients showed interest in month one than we saw all of last year. Sarah L. Dental Practice We went from invisible on Google to the top of the local map pack. The phone rings nonstop with people wanting to book reservations. James T. Local Restaurant Owner The AI voice receptionist keeps paying for itself every month. We used to lose 20% of calls because nobody could pick up. Amanda K. Law Firm Email automation transformed our business. We used to spend hours every week on manual follow-ups. Now it runs itself, and our close rate is up 40%. David M. Real Estate Agency Our landing page generated $47,000 in revenue during its first month. Not a typo. Best marketing investment we've ever made. Jennifer P. E-commerce Business Success Stories Case Studies Real numbers from real clients. No marketing fluff. Success Story HVAC Company This HVAC company was pulling about 15 leads a month from their website. The business relied almost entirely on referrals and word of mouth. The Solution We installed a 24/7 AI chatbot for lead capture, optimized their Google Business profile, and built landing pages targeting the areas they serve. The Results Eight weeks later: over 100 leads in a single month. That's a 567% increase. Their cost per lead dropped 62%, and the chatbot now books appointments automatically. I wasn't sure at first, but they delivered. Our phone hasn't stopped ringing since. HVAC Company Success Story Dental Practice A new dental clinic struggling to fill chairs. Too many no-shows, and their online reviews were a mess. The Solution We set up an AI-powered phone scheduler plus automated follow-up emails to confirm appointments and request patient feedback. The Results Month one: 47 new patient appointments. No-shows dropped 73%. They hit a 4.8-star rating with over 120 reviews. Our staff saves 10+ hours every week with the automation, and patient flow has been incredible. Dental Practice

Trained on your website, docs, and PDFs so it understands your business inside and out. Qualifies every lead before booking, so you only meet with people who are ready to buy. services-ai-voice.fullContent: Virtual Front Desk Every missed call is lost revenue. When no one picks up, your customer calls the next business on Google. Our AI receptionist answers every call instantly — day or night. It books appointments, answers questions, and runs your front desk without supervision. Your Phone Works 24/7 Now Most businesses only answer about two-thirds of their calls. That means a third of potential revenue goes straight to a competitor. Our AI receptionist picks up every single call, engages the caller in natural conversation, and books appointments around the clock — even at 2 AM on a Sunday. It answers on the first ring. Your callers get a natural, human-like conversation and book their appointments — no voicemail, no waiting. The AI qualifies callers, identifies who needs your services, and books them straight into your schedule. Need flexibility? The AI can forward urgent calls to your mobile or take a detailed message and text it to you. Keep your existing phone number. No changes, no porting. Your number stays yours. Setup takes less than an hour. We train the AI on your services, hours, and call handling preferences — then it goes live. It syncs with whatever calendar you use. Google, Outlook, Calendly — no double-bookings, ever. Pricing Starting at $497 setup + $249/mo Full setup, custom training, and 24/7 support included Start 7-Day Free Trial Got questions? We're here to help! How fast can I get this running? Most businesses are live within 48 hours. Just tell us about your services, your availability, and how you want calls handled. We take care of the rest. What if it can't help someone? You set the routing rules. The AI can collect the caller's details and text them to you, forward the call to your mobile, or schedule a callback — whatever fits your workflow. Do I need a new phone number? No. You keep your existing number. We route incoming calls through our system behind the scenes — nothing changes for your customers. How do I know how many calls you handled? Your dashboard shows everything — call volume, duration, outcomes, and booked appointments. Full visibility, zero guesswork. Stop losing customers to voicemail. Try it free for 7 days. See how many extra appointments your business books when every call gets answered. Start Free Trial

services-lead-funnel.fullContent: AI Assisted Leadgen Most lead funnels fail in one of two ways: they overwhelm visitors with too many form fields, or they go silent after the first touchpoint. Our AI-powered funnels guide prospects from first click to booked appointment—without dropping a single lead. Why AI Assisted Leadgen Works Better We build lead funnels that turn prospects into booked appointments. Here's how the system works: First, we identify a lead magnet your target customers can't resist—a checklist, guide, calculator, or resource they'll download without hesitation. Next, we design a landing page built for conversions. We target 20% conversion rates or higher. Most agencies celebrate 5%—we don't stop there. Then we create an email sequence that reads like a personal conversation, not a mass blast. Each message nurtures leads progressively until they're ready for a call. By syncing with your calendar, we skip the back-and-forth email threads and let qualified leads book time with you directly. We also handle all the tracking. You'll see exactly what's working and where to improve—no guesswork. Pricing $1,499 setup + $299/mo Complete lead generation system Transparent pricing. We build the system, manage it, and keep your pipeline full. Get Started Most customers get their first qualified lead in under a week. Three Channels, One System Most businesses only use one or two of these channels. We connect all three so you capture every lead—no matter where a prospect first discovers you. Website Chatbot Engages visitors at the right moment, asks qualifying questions, and books appointments—all on autopilot, 24/7. Never miss a lead again Facebook Messenger 1.3 billion people use Messenger every month. Reach prospects on a platform they already use and trust—with instant, automated responses. Instant response, any time of day LinkedIn Automation Finds prospects who match your criteria, engages with their content through meaningful comments and shares, and starts conversations that lead to sales. Warm introductions at scale Common Questions Is this chatbot different from the one I already have? Most chatbots handle basic FAQ-style questions and stop there. Ours is a sales tool. It qualifies visitors through a natural conversation, collects their contact information, and books appointments on your calendar—without you lifting a finger. One client told us their old bot felt like a vending machine. Ours works more like a top sales rep who never clocks out. What if I already have a CRM? We integrate with all major CRM platforms—HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Zoho, and more. Every conversation and data point flows directly into your existing setup. Your team gets full visibility, and leads never have to repeat themselves. Facebook Messenger sounds complicated. Is it? Not at all—this is one of our strengths. Here's a typical scenario: someone messages your Facebook page at 3 AM. Your AI assistant responds instantly, asks a few qualifying questions, and if they're a fit, books a call at their convenience. They pick a slot from your calendar, and it's done. You wake up to a calendar full of qualified appointments. I have tried LinkedIn automation before and it felt spammy. We understand that concern completely. Generic bots that blast the same message to everyone are ineffective and damage your reputation. Our approach is different. We identify individuals who match your ideal customer profile, engage with their content through thoughtful and relevant comments, and then open genuine conversations. The result is warm introductions—not cold spam. How long does it take to see the results? Timeline depends on your current traffic levels. That said, most clients see their first qualified lead within the first week. The system also improves over time—it learns what converts best for your specific business. By week three or four, you'll typically have a steady flow of leads coming in without any extra effort on your end. What if I want to change things after the launch? During the first month, all modifications are included at no extra cost. After that, changes are billed at reasonable hourly rates. We don't disappear after launch—you'll get regular updates on performance and optimizations. Most clients stay with us not because of a contract, but because the system delivers consistent results. The Number One Reason Leads Get Lost It's response time. If a lead doesn't hear back within 5 minutes, the chance of conversion drops by 10x. People get distracted, lose interest, or find a competitor who responded faster. One gym owner we work with put it this way: "I was losing 5 to 10 leads every week because I couldn't respond fast enough. Now I wake up to appointments already on my calendar." Book Your Discovery Call 15 minutes, no pressure. We'll discuss your goals and see if we're the right fit.

services-seo-content.fullContent: Content That Ranks We write articles that your target audience will read, share, and trust. We discover the questions your buyers are asking and provide clear answers. No fluff, no keyword stuffing—just helpful information that steadily brings traffic to your website. Some pages attract steady traffic for years. Others get zero visitors. The difference is strategy. We write for your audience first and search engines second—so your content performs on both fronts. Here's what goes into every article: Around 2,000 words of in-depth content that fully answers the search query. No filler, no padding. We don't guess at keywords. We dig into ones with real search volume—actual opportunities, not made-up nonsense. Strategic internal linking that connects related pages on your site, helping both readers and search engines navigate your content. Compelling meta descriptions—the preview text shown in Google search results—written to grab attention and drive clicks to your page. Titles that sound appealing to the reader while simultaneously being friendly to search engines. Every article is delivered publish-ready and formatted for your platform—WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, or any other CMS you use. Pricing Starting at $149 /article One-time fee per article Or $499/month for 4 new articles delivered each month. Order Article Before You Ask How do you decide what to write about? We research what your competitors rank for, analyze the questions your customers are asking, and identify which search terms are driving real traffic. We include you in every content decision before writing begins—so there are no surprises. Do you guarantee first page rankings? No reputable agency can guarantee specific rankings—anyone who does is being misleading. What we do guarantee is well-researched, expertly written content that follows SEO best practices. Rankings depend on many factors including competition, domain authority, and site age, but strong content is the foundation of every successful strategy. Can you post the articles on my website? Certainly. WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, etc. we can log in and post it, or just give you the content to upload yourself. Whatever is most convenient for you. Which type of articles are best? How-to guides, industry explainers, product comparisons, and FAQ pages tend to perform best. The common thread is that they answer the specific questions your target audience is searching for. Organic Traffic That Converts A home services client went from getting 300 visitors per month to 3,000 in only 4 months. It was the right content in the right way that made it happen. Write My First Article

The goal is to make every email feel like a personal conversation between just two people. Whether it's HVAC or legal services, we have experience across both. Here's what we deliver: Welcome emails that read like a personal note, not a mass broadcast. Abandoned cart recovery emails that bring shoppers back — we typically see 15-30% recovery rates. Follow-up emails that nurture leads without being pushy. Re-engagement campaigns for long-lost subscribers who haven't opened your emails in months. Intelligent triggers based on real user behavior on your site. A/B testing on every sequence. We measure what works and cut what doesn't. Pricing Starting at $199 setup + $49/mo Personalized sequence creation and monthly fine-tuning. First 2,500 subscribers included Start 7-Day Free Trial Common Questions How long does this take? About one week. We spend 1-2 days learning your communication style, setting up the platform, and running initial tests. Taking the time upfront means fewer revisions later. What platforms do you work with? Mailchimp, ConvertKit, Klaviyo, ActiveCampaign, and most others. If you're on a less common platform, we'll find a way to make it work. Can I write my own copy? Absolutely. You can write your own copy, we can write it, or we collaborate on a hybrid version. Your business, your call. What about spam filters? We handle all the technical details — DKIM, SPF, and list hygiene — so your emails actually reach inboxes. Most clients see a 95%+ delivery rate. Stop Chasing Leads Manually One of the clients has said it best: "I used to spend 3 hours a day on follow-ups. Now it all happens while I sleep." Let's Build Your Sequence

services-social-media.fullContent: Consistent Social Presence Consistent posting builds your brand, but it takes time you don't have. We handle it—three posts a week with real photos and captions that start conversations. Your brand stays visible and your audience stays engaged. You want results without being glued to your phone all day. Here's what we deliver: 20 posts a month that sound like you—no stiff corporate language. We manage LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and X. All of them, if you want. Custom visuals that represent your brand. No more generic stock photos. Hashtags researched and selected to reach new audiences, not randomly thrown together. Community engagement—we reply to comments, answer questions, and build relationships on your behalf. Monthly performance reports with the metrics that matter. No vanity numbers. Pricing Starting at $299 /mo We also prepare and schedule your content. Start 7-Day Free Trial Common Questions Which platforms work best for my business? It depends on your audience. A local restaurant does better on Instagram and Google Business than LinkedIn. We identify where your customers spend their time and focus there. Can I preview posts before they go live? Of course. You get a content calendar at the start of each month. Review it, approve it, request changes—we don’t publish anything without your sign-off. Can you post from my accounts? Yes, if you give us access. Or we deliver the content and you post it yourself. Whatever you’re comfortable with. What if the content doesn’t sound right? We adjust. It usually takes one or two rounds to nail your brand voice. We keep refining until it sounds like you. Your Social Media, Handled One restaurant owner told us: "I kept meaning to post but never did. Now my Instagram actually looks alive." Get a Content Calendar

services-ad-copy.fullContent: Peak Performance Ads Optimization Stop burning money on ads nobody clicks. We write sharp headlines, test multiple variations, and optimize your campaigns every week. Your cost per lead goes down. Your results go up. Here's a number that should bother you: most companies waste 30-50% of their ad budget on weak copy. We fix that. We write 4-8 headline variations per ad set and let real data pick the winner. Clear calls to action that make people click—not generic ‘Learn More’ buttons everyone scrolls past. Platform-specific copy for Google, Meta, LinkedIn, and Microsoft Ads. What works on LinkedIn won’t work on Instagram. Different messaging for different audiences. A homeowner thinks differently than a contractor. Ad quality scores that get your ads noticed faster and shown more often. Weekly optimizations based on performance data, not guesswork. Pricing From $299 set up + $199/mth Unlimited copy revisions. Start 7-Day Free Trial Quick Questions Which platforms do you handle? Google Ads, Meta (Facebook and Instagram), LinkedIn Ads, and Microsoft Ads. Each platform has its own best practices, so we tailor copy for every one. How many variations do you write? Typically 4-8 per ad set. Enough to run meaningful tests without overcomplicating things. What if I already have ads running? No problem. We’ll benchmark your current ads against our new versions. Sometimes a small tweak is all it takes. Other times, a full rewrite makes the difference. How do you know if it’s working? We track clicks, conversions, and cost per lead. When results go up and costs go down, it’s working. We don’t chase vanity metrics. Want to stop wasting your ad budget? One dental client cut their cost per lead by 40% in the first month. Better copy, less waste. Get Better Copy

services-google-business.fullContent: Local Search Mastery If you're not in the top 3 of Google's map pack, your competitors are getting those calls. Most business profiles are incomplete or poorly optimized. We fix that so local customers find you and pick up the phone. Make yourself visible to local customers Most Google Business profiles are only half-finished. That's money going straight to your competitors. We optimize every detail of your profile so you rank higher in local search results. Keyword research to find the exact terms your local customers are searching for. Updated, high-quality photos that make a strong first impression. Accurate categories so Google shows your business for the right searches. Q&A section filled with the questions customers ask most, along with clear answers. Professional responses to every review—positive and negative. Tracking setup so you can see exactly how many calls and website visits your profile drives. Pricing $399 one-time Complete optimization and 30 days of ranking tweaking. Get Started Today Common Questions How long until I show up in searches? Most businesses see initial improvements within 3-7 days. The bigger gains come when you start appearing in the map pack, which typically happens within a month. Do I need to give you new photos? Not unless your current ones need replacing. We work with what you have and advise on what would help. If your photos are solid, we use them. What if my profile already exists? That’s ideal. Most existing profiles are only about 60% complete. We fill in the gaps and optimize everything that’s already there. Is this a monthly thing? One-time setup. We optimize it, hand it back, and you’re done. If you want ongoing management later, we can discuss that—but there’s no pressure. Show Up When It Matters Get found by customers in your area. Start showing up where it matters. Get Started

services-review-response.fullContent: Reputation Management Every review deserves a response. We handle yours automatically—thoughtful, personalized replies within 24 hours. It shows customers you care, and it helps your business rank higher in local search. Here's how we protect and build your reputation while you focus on running your business: Positive reviews get sincere, specific thank-you responses—not generic templates. Negative reviews are handled professionally. We de-escalate the situation so you don’t have to. Every response is trained to match your voice and tone, not sound like a corporate press release. We monitor Google, Yelp, Facebook, and any other platform where customers leave feedback. If something urgent comes in, you get an immediate alert on your phone so you can step in if needed. Responses go out quickly—often within minutes, not hours. Pricing Starting at $99 /mo The price includes unlimited number of replies. There is no charge per review. Start 7-Day Free Trial Common Questions Can I tweak the responses? Yes. You can adjust the tone, approve templates in advance, or just let it run. You’re always in control of how your brand sounds. Which platforms do you monitor? Everywhere your customers leave reviews. Google, Yelp, TripAdvisor, Facebook, and more. What about angry customers? Sensitive reviews get flagged and sent to you immediately. We don’t let AI handle heated situations unsupervised unless you tell us otherwise. Does it sound robotic? Not at all. We train it to avoid the ‘Thank you, valued customer’ template tone. Every reply reads like a real person wrote it. Build Trust Automatically Every review should receive a response. Let your customers know that you value them. Get started today. Start Free Trial

about.fullContent: About AMP Marketing We help find more leads for businesses and help them close more sales through technologies that really work. Results-First We measure success by outcomes, not activity. Every dollar you invest should bring back more in return. No-Nonsense Clear communication, upfront prices, realistic timelines. No corporate jargon, no hidden fees. Fast & Flexible We move fast and scale with your business. No bureaucracy, no endless approval chains. Our Story AMP Marketing was built by the same team behind Prime Marketing Experts . With Michael Krieger at the helm, our core mission hasn't changed: help businesses grow through smart, results-driven marketing. Michael founded Prime Marketing Experts back in 2017. He grew up in Boston, graduated from UMass Lowell, and has spent the better part of his career helping businesses scale. Along the way, he saw something clearly: AI had reached a point where it could make marketing faster and far more affordable for everyday businesses. AMP Marketing is the result of that realization. We took everything we learned at Prime and combined it with AI tools that deliver qualified leads in days, not months. Today we serve over 500 businesses nationwide. Whether you're a plumber or a law firm, you get the same attention to detail and focus on results that Michael has brought to every project since day one. The AMP Marketing Difference Fair Pricing You know exactly what you're paying for. No surprise fees, and you can cancel whenever you want. Measurable Results We track every lead so you always know whether your investment is paying off. Fast Setup Most projects launch within a week. No waiting months to see results. Real Support Questions? Send us an email. Real people manage your account and respond quickly. Let us Get to Work → What Our Clients Say We scaled from 10 leads a month to over 100 in just 8 weeks. The chatbot generates leads around the clock while we focus on running the business. Mike R. HVAC Company Owner We've worked with several agencies before, but none delivered this fast. More patients showed interest in month one than we saw all of last year. Sarah L. Dental Practice We went from invisible on Google to the top of the local map pack. The phone rings nonstop with people wanting to book reservations. James T. Local Restaurant Owner The AI voice receptionist keeps paying for itself every month. We used to lose 20% of calls because nobody could pick up. Amanda K. Law Firm Email automation transformed our business. We used to spend hours every week on manual follow-ups. Now it runs itself, and our close rate is up 40%. David M. Real Estate Agency Our landing page generated $47,000 in revenue during its first month. Not a typo. Best marketing investment we've ever made. Jennifer P. E-commerce Business Success Stories Case Studies Real numbers from real clients. No marketing fluff. Success Story HVAC Company This HVAC company was pulling about 15 leads a month from their website. The business relied almost entirely on referrals and word of mouth. The Solution We installed a 24/7 AI chatbot for lead capture, optimized their Google Business profile, and built landing pages targeting the areas they serve. The Results Eight weeks later: over 100 leads in a single month. That's a 567% increase. Their cost per lead dropped 62%, and the chatbot now books appointments automatically. I wasn't sure at first, but they delivered. Our phone hasn't stopped ringing since. HVAC Company Success Story Dental Practice A new dental clinic struggling to fill chairs. Too many no-shows, and their online reviews were a mess. The Solution We set up an AI-powered phone scheduler plus automated follow-up emails to confirm appointments and request patient feedback. The Results Month one: 47 new patient appointments. No-shows dropped 73%. They hit a 4.8-star rating with over 120 reviews. Our staff saves 10+ hours every week with the automation, and patient flow has been incredible. Dental Practice

services-ai-voice.fullContent: Virtual Front Desk Every missed call is lost revenue. When no one picks up, your customer calls the next business on Google. Our AI receptionist answers every call instantly — day or night. It books appointments, answers questions, and runs your front desk without supervision. Your Phone Works 24/7 Now Most businesses only answer about two-thirds of their calls. That means a third of potential revenue goes straight to a competitor. Our AI receptionist picks up every single call, engages the caller in natural conversation, and books appointments around the clock — even at 2 AM on a Sunday. It answers on the first ring. Your callers get a natural, human-like conversation and book their appointments — no voicemail, no waiting. The AI qualifies callers, identifies who needs your services, and books them straight into your schedule. Need flexibility? The AI can forward urgent calls to your mobile or take a detailed message and text it to you. Keep your existing phone number. No changes, no porting. Your number stays yours. Setup takes less than an hour. We train the AI on your services, hours, and call handling preferences — then it goes live. It syncs with whatever calendar you use. Google, Outlook, Calendly — no double-bookings, ever. Pricing Starting at $497 setup + $249/mo Full setup, custom training, and 24/7 support included Start 7-Day Free Trial Got questions? We're here to help! How fast can I get this running? Most businesses are live within 48 hours. Just tell us about your services, your availability, and how you want calls handled. We take care of the rest. What if it can't help someone? You set the routing rules. The AI can collect the caller's details and text them to you, forward the call to your mobile, or schedule a callback — whatever fits your workflow. Do I need a new phone number? No. You keep your existing number. We route incoming calls through our system behind the scenes — nothing changes for your customers. How do I know how many calls you handled? Your dashboard shows everything — call volume, duration, outcomes, and booked appointments. Full visibility, zero guesswork. Stop losing customers to voicemail. Try it free for 7 days. See how many extra appointments your business books when every call gets answered. Start Free Trial

services-lead-funnel.fullContent: AI Assisted Leadgen Most lead funnels fail in one of two ways: they overwhelm visitors with too many form fields, or they go silent after the first touchpoint. Our AI-powered funnels guide prospects from first click to booked appointment—without dropping a single lead. Why AI Assisted Leadgen Works Better We build lead funnels that turn prospects into booked appointments. Here's how the system works: First, we identify a lead magnet your target customers can't resist—a checklist, guide, calculator, or resource they'll download without hesitation. Next, we design a landing page built for conversions. We target 20% conversion rates or higher. Most agencies celebrate 5%—we don't stop there. Then we create an email sequence that reads like a personal conversation, not a mass blast. Each message nurtures leads progressively until they're ready for a call. By syncing with your calendar, we skip the back-and-forth email threads and let qualified leads book time with you directly. We also handle all the tracking. You'll see exactly what's working and where to improve—no guesswork. Pricing $1,499 setup + $299/mo Complete lead generation system Transparent pricing. We build the system, manage it, and keep your pipeline full. Get Started Most customers get their first qualified lead in under a week. Three Channels, One System Most businesses only use one or two of these channels. We connect all three so you capture every lead—no matter where a prospect first discovers you. Website Chatbot Engages visitors at the right moment, asks qualifying questions, and books appointments—all on autopilot, 24/7. Never miss a lead again Facebook Messenger 1.3 billion people use Messenger every month. Reach prospects on a platform they already use and trust—with instant, automated responses. Instant response, any time of day LinkedIn Automation Finds prospects who match your criteria, engages with their content through meaningful comments and shares, and starts conversations that lead to sales. Warm introductions at scale Common Questions Is this chatbot different from the one I already have? Most chatbots handle basic FAQ-style questions and stop there. Ours is a sales tool. It qualifies visitors through a natural conversation, collects their contact information, and books appointments on your calendar—without you lifting a finger. One client told us their old bot felt like a vending machine. Ours works more like a top sales rep who never clocks out. What if I already have a CRM? We integrate with all major CRM platforms—HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Zoho, and more. Every conversation and data point flows directly into your existing setup. Your team gets full visibility, and leads never have to repeat themselves. Facebook Messenger sounds complicated. Is it? Not at all—this is one of our strengths. Here's a typical scenario: someone messages your Facebook page at 3 AM. Your AI assistant responds instantly, asks a few qualifying questions, and if they're a fit, books a call at their convenience. They pick a slot from your calendar, and it's done. You wake up to a calendar full of qualified appointments. I have tried LinkedIn automation before and it felt spammy. We understand that concern completely. Generic bots that blast the same message to everyone are ineffective and damage your reputation. Our approach is different. We identify individuals who match your ideal customer profile, engage with their content through thoughtful and relevant comments, and then open genuine conversations. The result is warm introductions—not cold spam. How long does it take to see the results? Timeline depends on your current traffic levels. That said, most clients see their first qualified lead within the first week. The system also improves over time—it learns what converts best for your specific business. By week three or four, you'll typically have a steady flow of leads coming in without any extra effort on your end. What if I want to change things after the launch? During the first month, all modifications are included at no extra cost. After that, changes are billed at reasonable hourly rates. We don't disappear after launch—you'll get regular updates on performance and optimizations. Most clients stay with us not because of a contract, but because the system delivers consistent results. The Number One Reason Leads Get Lost It's response time. If a lead doesn't hear back within 5 minutes, the chance of conversion drops by 10x. People get distracted, lose interest, or find a competitor who responded faster. Our AI-powered funnels guide prospects from first click to booked appointment—without dropping a single lead. Here's how the system works: First, we identify a lead magnet your target customers can't resist—a checklist, guide, calculator, or resource they'll download without hesitation. Then we create an email sequence that reads like a personal conversation, not a mass blast. Each message nurtures leads progressively until they're ready for a call. services-seo-content.fullContent: Content That Ranks We write articles that your target audience will read, share, and trust. We discover the questions your buyers are asking and provide clear answers. No fluff, no keyword stuffing—just helpful information that steadily brings traffic to your website. Some pages attract steady traffic for years. Others get zero visitors. The difference is strategy. We write for your audience first and search engines second—so your content performs on both fronts. Here's what goes into every article: Around 2,000 words of in-depth content that fully answers the search query. No filler, no padding. We don’t guess at keywords. We dig into ones with real search volume—actual opportunities, not made-up nonsense. Strategic internal linking that connects related pages on your site, helping both readers and search engines navigate your content. Compelling meta descriptions—the preview text shown in Google search results—written to grab attention and drive clicks to your page. Titles that sound appealing to the reader while simultaneously being friendly to search engines. Every article is delivered publish-ready and formatted for your platform—WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, or any other CMS you use. Pricing Starting at $149 /article One-time fee per article Or $499/month for 4 new articles delivered each month. Order Article Before You Ask How do you decide what to write about? We research what your competitors rank for, analyze the questions your customers are asking, and identify which search terms are driving real traffic. We include you in every content decision before writing begins—so there are no surprises. Do you guarantee first page rankings? No reputable agency can guarantee specific rankings—anyone who does is being misleading. What we do guarantee is well-researched, expertly written content that follows SEO best practices. Rankings depend on many factors including competition, domain authority, and site age, but strong content is the foundation of every successful strategy. Can you post the articles on my website? Certainly. WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, etc. we can log in and post it, or just give you the content to upload yourself. Whatever is most convenient for you. Which type of articles are best? How-to guides, industry explainers, product comparisons, and FAQ pages tend to perform best. The common thread is that they answer the specific questions your target audience is searching for. Organic Traffic That Converts A home services client went from getting 300 visitors per month to 3,000 in only 4 months. It was the right content in the right way that made it happen. Write My First Article

services-email-automation.fullContent: Human-Like Follow Ups Most automated emails feel like spam. Ours don't. Our sequences read as if a real person wrote them, not a robot. That's how you convert subscribers into customers without sounding robotic. Most customers report seeing a positive impact within a week. The goal is to make every email feel like a personal conversation between just two people. Whether it's HVAC or legal services, we have experience across both. Here's what we deliver: Welcome emails that read like a personal note, not a mass broadcast. Abandoned cart recovery emails that bring shoppers back — we typically see 15-30% recovery rates. Follow-up emails that nurture leads without being pushy. Re-engagement campaigns for long-lost subscribers who haven't opened your emails in months. Intelligent triggers based on real user behavior on your site. A/B testing on every sequence. We measure what works and cut what doesn't. Pricing Starting at $199 setup + $49/mo Personalized sequence creation and monthly fine-tuning. First 2,500 subscribers included Start 7-Day Free Trial Common Questions How long does this take? About one week. We spend 1-2 days learning your communication style, setting up the platform, and running initial tests. Taking the time upfront means fewer revisions later. What platforms do you work with? Mailchimp, ConvertKit, Klaviyo, ActiveCampaign, and most others. If you're on a less common platform, we'll find a way to make it work. Can I write my own copy? Absolutely. You can write your own copy, we can write it, or we collaborate on a hybrid version. Your business, your call. What about spam filters? We handle all the technical details — DKIM, SPF, and list hygiene — so your emails actually reach inboxes. Most clients see a 95%+ delivery rate. Stop Chasing Leads Manually One of the clients has said it best: "I used to spend 3 hours a day on follow-ups. Now it all happens while I sleep." Let's Build Your Sequence
